message:
Jan. 26, 2026

No critical announcements. See tool update below for latest changes.
tool_update: v2.2.11: Fixed chat streaming render jumbling during agent responses. UX quality improvements across the board. Canvas deep-link fixes with UUID validation. Security update for esbuild CORS vulnerability. Backend: ~20% faster response streaming via Bedrock migration. Improved web search. Jira integration with semantic search.
